Hi, 

I started writing some tests for my app in C#, and I am using NUnit (=
hope it's OK to post here, NUnit is just a transcript of JUnit).
My problem=
 is that when I test code that ends up modifying a DB, I need to restore DB=
 every time I finish my tests and that is not allways possible and it takes=
 time.
Is there other way to do this, like using mock objects. I started co=
nstructing DataSets from code, but needs really lot of code ant that's gett=
ing tedious.
Any suggestions?

Danijel Arsenovski
www.refactorizacion.com;
=
www.teslateam.com
